# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0.3] - 2020-06-19

- Add support for Carbon >= 1.29.0

## [1.0.2] - 2020-06-14

- Add travel each method.
- Update docs:
    - Only require package for dev environment.
    - Add real world examples.

## [1.0.1] - 2020-05-18

- Enhance tests
- Fix typo in README

## [1.0.0] - 2020-05-17

- initial release
